fields.text: Spawns an ethereal hammer that spirals outwards, damaging enemies it hits

Forces a monster to attack you while lowering their resistances and damage

Lowers defense and resistances of all enemies in the area
Increase damage and speed based on how many monsters you've killed this game

Increase the damage and attack speed of allies in the area
